alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:32PM CDT until June 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LOWNDES AND SOUTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tyler, or 9 miles southeast of Selmont-West Selmont, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. A 60 mph wind gust was recently recorded at the Selma Airport. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Selma, Selmont-West Selmont, White Hall, Benton, Old Cahaba Park, Tyler, Selma Drag Strip, Collirene, Edmund Pettus Bridge and Craig Field Aiport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
